title: Of the going down of Christ into Hell
text: As Christ died for us, and was buried, so also it is to be believed, that he went down into Hell.
commentary: Article 3, “Of the going down of Christ into Hell”, states: As Christ died for us, and was buried, so also it is to be believed, that he went down into Hell. The commentary below is a concise study essay offering historical context, theological significance, and suggestions for further study. Historically this Article reflects the Reformation effort to retain the catholic tradition where it is scriptural while rejecting practices viewed as unscriptural. For modern readers, note how this Article shapes worship, preaching, and ethical teaching, and compare it with patristic sources and later Anglican commentators.
